medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has experienced symptoms for 6 months, progressively worsening. Denies cough, wheezing, or fever. Oxygen saturation decreased from 93% to 88% after ambulation. The patient has a history of smoking crack cocaine and tobacco.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Paranoid schizophrenia, previous exposure to asbestos, history of incarceration.
medical_history.social_history: Lives in a boarding house; smokes crack cocaine and tobacco.
